Clay Charm Magic / Arts & Crafts Book

Published Author

Clay Charm Magic is a children’s instructional craft book featuring 25 step-by-step polymer clay projects. The book was published by Skyhorse Publishing in 2014. Available in major bookstores and libraries across North America, including Chapters Indigo and Barnes & Noble.

Spotted at Calgary Central Library

Made with . This site is coded by Helga Jiang, powered by Jekyll, and hosted on Github Pages.
